analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Crowdsale.claimTeamTokens (/unique_chucks/6/0x53151a85ea7b82a4b43903427953efba067cde92.sol#331-364):
	External calls:
	- assert(bool)(tokenTotalSupply > ERC20TokenInterface(tokenAddress).totalSupply()) (/unique_chucks/6/0x53151a85ea7b82a4b43903427953efba067cde92.sol#351-353)
	- mintAmount = tokenTotalSupply - ERC20TokenInterface(tokenAddress).totalSupply() (/unique_chucks/6/0x53151a85ea7b82a4b43903427953efba067cde92.sol#353-358)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- foundersAndTeamTokensClaimed (/unique_chucks/6/0x53151a85ea7b82a4b43903427953efba067cde92.sol#358-359)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.processTransaction (/unique_chucks/6/0x53151a85ea7b82a4b43903427953efba067cde92.sol#220-255):
	External calls:
	- SportifyTokenInterface(tokenAddress).mint(_contributor,tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/6/0x53151a85ea7b82a4b43903427953efba067cde92.sol#247-251)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- contributorList (/unique_chucks/6/0x53151a85ea7b82a4b43903427953efba067cde92.sol#251-252)
mintAmount in Crowdsale.claimTeamTokens (/unique_chucks/6/0x53151a85ea7b82a4b43903427953efba067cde92.sol#335) is a local variable never initialiazed

Crowdsale.salvageTokensFromContract (/unique_chucks/6/0x53151a85ea7b82a4b43903427953efba067cde92.sol#268-276) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20TokenInterface(_tokenAddress).transfer(_to,_amount) (/unique_chucks/6/0x53151a85ea7b82a4b43903427953efba067cde92.sol#272-276)

Crowdsale.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/6/0x53151a85ea7b82a4b43903427953efba067cde92.sol#132)
Crowdsale.ethToTokenConversion should be constant (/unique_chucks/6/0x53151a85ea7b82a4b43903427953efba067cde92.sol#132)
